name: python-reference-counter
description: Show Python function / method / class reference counts via CodeLens (PyCharm style).

pythonReferenceCounter.showZeroReference.description: Show CodeLens even when there are zero references

pythonReferenceCounter.includeDefinition.description: Include the definition itself in the reference count

pythonReferenceCounter.enableForClasses.description: Enable reference counting for class definitions

pythonReferenceCounter.enableForFunction.description: Enable reference counting for function definitions

pythonReferenceCounter.enableFallbackWor.description: When language server returns only local references, perform a naive workspace-wide text scan (may be slower / include false positives).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
